---
title: "M&M consumption"
output: html_notebook
---

## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## get original data

```{r}
mm=read_excel("../workshop-stats/MMConsumption.xls")
mm
```

needs tidying

```{r}
mm %>% gather(gender,candies,everything()) -> mm2
mm2
```

## boxplot

```{r}
ggplot(mm2,aes(x=gender, y=candies))+geom_boxplot()
```

means

```{r}

```

```{r}
mm2 %>% group_by(gender) %>% 
  summarize(mean=mean(candies),med=median(candies))
```

two-sample t (probably not good)

```{r}
t.test(candies~gender,data=mm2)
```

Mood's median test

```{r}
library(smmr)
median_test(mm2,candies,gender)
```

save the data

```{r}
write_delim(mm2,"mm.txt"," ")
```
